title: Lenovo ThinkCentre M90/M90p desktop tour
description:
Maximize performance and ROI !!!  Your large enterprise or mid-market business gets both with the sophisticated Lenovo ThinkCentre® M90/M90p desktop. Available in three standard form factors: Tower, Small Form Factor (SFF) and Eco Ultra Small Form Factor (USFF).   These best-in-class desktops deliver the latest technology for industry-leading performance, strong stability and easy manageability, helping boost productivity and reduce IT costs. See below
--Next-generation Intel® Core™ i processors with Turbo Boost and Hyper-Threading technology
--Intel® vPro™ with Active Management Technology (AMT) 6.0 support
--Lenovo Enhanced Experience for Windows 7
--15-month stable platform
--Secure Managed Client 2.0 support
